name: Enchanted Inc.
description:
The day is coming to an end, but there are still swords waiting to be enchanted! It seems your wizard employees need to do some overtime! Can you enchant enough swords to reach your company goal?

Enchantend Inc. is a simple rythmic game. Each wizards corresponds to a letter on your keyboard. Press the correct letter when a sword is right in front of a wizard! Wizards on the blue assembly line have the advantage that they only have to press the space button!

Try to find your rythm and get as much points possbile before the time runs out.

How to Play

There are two enchantment lines with 4 wizards each.
Press the key shown above the wizard when a sword passes by to enchant it. 

On the green line you will use the keys F, D, S and A.
The blue line is entirely controlled with Space (SPC)

Your score will be defined by the number of enchantments.

Hint: There is rythm and a pattern, try to find it!
